Class Ownable

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.fields.Field
      • entity.fields.Ownable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Brewery, Plot, ShippingLine

    public abstract class Ownable
extends Field

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean buyField(Player player, GameBoard gameBoard, PlayerList playerList)
      Makes you able to buy an ownable field.
      boolean buyField(Player player, int price, GameBoard gameBoard, PlayerList playerList)
      Makes you able to buy an ownable field at a specific price.
      Player getOwner()
      Returns the owner of the field.
      int getPawnValue()
      Returns the pawn value of the field.
      int getPrice()
      Returns the price of the field.
      boolean isPawned()
      Returns whether the field is pawned or not.
      void landOnField(Player player, int roll, GameBoard gameBoard, PlayerList playerList, boolean taxChoice)
      Method that will execute what has to happen to the player that lands on the field.
      boolean pawnField()
      Pawns the field(including money transactions).
      void releasePawnField()
      Resets isPawned to false(used when a pawned field it returned to the bank on bankruptcy).
      void setOwner(Player newOwner)
      Sets the owner of the field.
      boolean tradeField(Player seller, Player buyer, int price, GameBoard gameBoard, PlayerList playerList)
      Makes a trade between two players, the parameter names should be self-explanatory.
      boolean undoPawnField(GameBoard gameBoard, PlayerList playerList)
      Undoes the pawn of the field(including money transactions).
      boolean undoPawnFieldWithoutInterest(GameBoard gameBoard, PlayerList playerList)
      Undoes the pawn of the field without interest(including money transactions).

      • Ownable

        public Ownable(java.lang.String name,
               int price)
        Constructor for the ownable type fields, because the class is abstract, this constructor is only used as a super constructor. By default it sets the owner, pawnValue and isPawned.
